title: FFMPEG Software
content: Video Stream Copy Copy Video and Transcode Audio Transcode Video and Copy Audio Transcode Video and Audio Transcode With Scaling With Constant Rate Factor Decode and Hardware Encode video Audio 7.1/5.1 Channels Audio Downmix to AAC 2.0 General Audio Downmix to AAC 2.0 Covert Ape To Flac Convert Alac to Flac Split Flac Files With Cuebreakpoints Video Stream Copy ffmpeg -i input -map 0 -c copy output.mkv Copy Video and Transcode Audio ffmpeg -i input.ts -c:v copy -c:a aac output.mp4 Transcode Video and Copy Audio ffmpeg -i input.ts -c:v libx264 -c:a copy output.mp4 Transcode Video and Audio ffmpeg -i input.ts -c:v libx264 -c:a aac output.mp4 Transcode With Scaling ffmpeg -i input.ts -c:v libx264 -s 720x480 -c:a copy output.mp4 With Constant Rate Factor ffmpeg -i input.ts -c:v libx264 -crf 18 -c:a aac output.mp4 Decode and Hardware Encode video ffmpeg -i input.wmv -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a aac output.mp4 Audio 7.1/5.1 Channels Audio Downmix to AAC 2.0 ffmpeg -i source.mkv -map 0:v:0 -c:v:0 copy -map 0:a:0 -c:a:0 aac -b:a:0 320k -filter:a:0 "pan=stereo|FL=1.414*FC+0.707*FL+0.5*FLC+0.5*BL+0.5*SL+0.5*LFE|FR=1.414*FC+0.707*FR+0.5*FRC+0.5*BR+0.5*SR+0.5*LFE,acompressor=ratio=4" -map 0:a:0 -c:a:1 copy -map 0:s:0 -c:s:0 copy -map 0:s:1 -c:s:1 copy -map 0:s:2 -c:s:2 copy output.mkv General Audio Downmix to AAC 2.0 ffmpeg -i source.mkv -map 0:v:0 -c:v:0 copy -map 0:a:0 -c:a:0 aac -b:a:0 320k -ac:a:0 2 -map 0:a:0 -c:a:1 copy -map 0:s:0 -c:s:0 copy -map 0:s:1 -c:s:1 copy -map 0:s:2 -c:s:2 copy output.mkv Covert Ape To Flac ffmpeg -i source.ape output.flac Convert Alac to Flac for file in *.m4a; do ffmpeg -i "$file" -f flac "`basename "$file" .m4a`.flac"; done Split Flac Files With Cuebreakpoints cuebreakpoints file.cue | shnsplit -o flac file.flac

title: Docker Backup And Restore
content: Backup Container Volume Restore Container Volume Backup Container Volume docker run --rm --volumes-from containerId --volume /backup/path/on/host:/backup busybox sh \ -c "cd /app/folder && tar -cvf /backup/volume-backup.tar ." Restore Container Volume docker run --rm --volumes-from containerId --volume /backup/path/on/host:/backup busybox sh \ -c "cd /path/to/volume/data && tar -xvf /backup/volume-backup.tar"

title: Nvidia Driver Installation
content:
Install Nvidia Driver By Repository Install Nvidia Driver By Run File Install Nvidia Driver By Repository Add non-free Debian repository
# Debian Bookworm deb http://deb.debian.org/debian/ bookworm main contrib non-free Update all packages to latest version
sudo apt-get update Install Nvidia Drivers
# Install nvidia driver from main repository sudo apt-get install nvidia-driver nvidia-smi # Install nvidia driver from back-ports sudo apt-get install -t nvidia-driver nvidia-smi Install Nvidia Driver By Run File Download linux driver from Nvidia
wget https://us.download.nvidia.com/XFree86/Linux-x86_64/xxx.xxx.xx/NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-xxx.xxx.xx.run Change execute permission for run file
sudo chmod 750 NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-xxx.xxx.xx.run Install from run file
# Install kernel module sudo ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-xxx.xxx.xx.run # Install without kernel module sudo ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-xxx.xxx.xx.run --no-kernel-module

title: VBA Excel
content: Read Data from a Closed Excel File or Workbook Find last row and column of range Loop Through Visible Filtered Rows Read Data from a Closed Excel File or Workbook Option Explicit Private Sub Workbook_Open() Call ReadDataFromCloseFile End Sub Sub ReadDataFromCloseFile() On Error GoTo ErrHandler Application.ScreenUpdating = False Dim src As Workbook ' OPEN THE SOURCE EXCEL WORKBOOK IN "READ ONLY MODE". Set src = Workbooks.Open("C:\Q-SALES.xlsx", True, True) ' GET THE TOTAL ROWS FROM THE SOURCE WORKBOOK. Dim iTotalRows As Integer iTotalRows = src.Worksheets("sheet1").Range("B1:B" & Cells(Rows.Count, "B").End(xlUp).Row).Rows.Count ' COPY DATA FROM SOURCE (CLOSE WORKGROUP) TO THE DESTINATION WORKBOOK. Dim iCnt As Integer ' COUNTER. For iCnt = 1 To iTotalRows Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("B" & iCnt).Formula = src.Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("B" & iCnt).Formula Next iCnt ' CLOSE THE SOURCE FILE. src.Close False ' FALSE - DON'T SAVE THE SOURCE FILE. Set src = Nothing ErrHandler: Application.EnableEvents = True Application.ScreenUpdating = True End Sub Find last row and column of range Dim lRow As Long Dim lCol As Long 'Find the last non-blank cell in column A(1) lRow = Cells(Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row 'Find the last non-blank cell in row 1 lCol = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column Find last row and column of range Dim lRow As Long Dim lCol As Long 'Find the last non-blank cell in column A(1) lRow = Cells(Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row 'Find the last non-blank cell in row 1 lCol = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column Loop Through Visible Filtered Rows Sub GetVisibleFilteredData() Dim sourceWorkook As Workbook Dim targetWorkbook As Workbook Dim sourceSheet As Worksheet Dim targetSheet As Worksheet Dim sourceWorkbookPath As String Dim targetWorkbookPath As String Dim lastRow As Long ' Define workbooks paths sourceWorkbookPath = "C:\sourceworkbook.xlsm" targetWorkbookPath = "C;\destinationworkbook.xlsx" ' Set a reference to the target Workbook and sheets Set sourceWorkbook = Workbooks.Open(sourceWorkbookPath) Set targetWorkbook = Workbooks.Open(targetWorkbookPath) ' definr worksheet's names for each workbook Set sourceSheet = sourceWorkbook.Worksheets("ST TO ST") Set targetSheet = targetWorkbook.Worksheets("Sheet1") With sourceSheet ' Get last row lastRow = .Range("J" & .Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Row .Range("A1:O1").AutoFilter Field:=12, Criteria1:="PENDING" .Range("A1:O1").AutoFilter Field:=10, Criteria1:="U3R", Operator:=xlOr, Criteria2:="U2R" .Range("J2:J" & lastRow).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible).Copy _ Destination:=targetSheet.Range("A1") .Range("C2:C" & lastRow).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible).Copy _ Destination:=targetSheet.Range("B1") .Range("D2:D" & lastRow).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible).Copy _ Destination:=targetSheet.Range("E1") .Range("H2:H" & lastRow).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible).Copy _ Destination:=targetSheet.Range("F1") End With End Sub

title: Adduser Command
